website_summaries.verdict: Between its ability to dehumidify 1,500 square feet, optional hose hookup, spacious 8-gallon reservoir, and convenient LED display controls, this small, yet powerful dehumidifier is worth your consideration.
pros: Pulls up to 30 pints of moisture from the air each day
Auto defrost, shutoff, and restart features
cons: Although you have the option for direct drainage, a hose is not included with this model

customer_reviews.title: Still works great a couple months in.  Does not include screw, which was maddening
customer_reviews.text: The unit works fine a few months after installing it. No issues except one, and it's pretty annoying. If you wish to attach a hose, you have to fiddle with the connector and hose to get it attached to the unit. It has a small clear tube that has to be connected to an inside nozzle which requires quite a bit of fiddling and hand strength. Also you need a screw to get the hose attachment mounted, and it's not included and no indication on size or type, which was maddening to find something that would work. For the cost of a penny or three, the damed screw could have been included.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F. Rebel

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working great, although it's very noisy! Have had mine for a month or less-it's sucking the moisture right out of the air. We can really feel the difference when breathing. Moving from a state that was 15% humidity to one that's 80% or higher, it's hard to get used to! But we don't have to now, at least when we're indoors! The water catcher is easy to dump and the buttons are easy to understand. I also purchased a 3 year warranty so I will be set if the dehumidifier decides to crap out on me! So far so good....
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the money
customer_reviews.text: This particular dehumidifier was less expensive than others that work for the same square footage. It arrived on time, well packaged, and in perfect condition. I plugged it up straight out of the box, and it’s been running beautifully since then (more than a week now). I live in a basement apartment with a natural ground spring behind my back wall. This machine has drastically improved the condition of my apartment. I recommend it to anyone in need of a good dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.author: English L. Eaves

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It's unbelievable how much excess moisture this dehumidifier has pulled out of my home. Gallons and gallons of water! Air quality is noticeably better now and all musty smells are gone. This machine is easy to set up, move around, empty and it's also pretty quiet. When the fan is set on turbo, it's no louder than a box fan on high speed. Much quieter when fan speed is set lower. The first couple days I was having to empty it several times a day. Now I only empty it once a day since the humidity level is much lower. It operates perfectly, exactly as described in the description. It was delivered on time and in excellent condition. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: NancyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective!!! Did I mention Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Super Quiet and rids the room of moisture! Was hesitant after reading reviews that it was a loud machine. But... After turning it on for the first time i had to sit and laugh out loud. Anyone who thinks this device is loud expects too much in this world. It uses a fan to move air to remove moisture. All you hear is a quiet fan. oh!, then i realized it was on Turbo mode so i switched that off and laughed some more that anyone could leave a bad review for loudness. After my histerics, i think i could hear the gentle grasp of a coconut husk from a European Swallow over this machine.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I live in a 6th floor, 500 square foot studio from the 60s in Foggy Bottom, Washington, DC, and it is humid. I am astonished by the amount of water in the air when I empty this thing. I do wish I'd bought the 70 pint because mine fills up in approximately two hours, but it's not this dehumidifier's fault that the Founding Fathers decided that a swamp was an appropriate place for the nation's capital.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Voltage!!!! Could you inform from next?
customer_reviews.text: There was no information for using international Voltage. So I had found that through Consumer's Q&A. And I watched somebody's answer that it can be used in 220V. So I ordered it. But It couldn't be used in 220V after i got the product. So I should buy the transformer. I hope you give the detailed information about the product. And.. It was expressed that the product had low noise. But it is not so silent to my regret..
customer_reviews.author: Dongin Seo

customer_reviews.title: Doing exactly what it was bought for
customer_reviews.text: I was quite surprised at the amount of moisture in the air. Being from the South with lots of humidity, I guess I don't feel 70% inside. :) I have the Ivation 30 Pint Dehumidifier on the level with all of our bedrooms and 2 full baths. It fills completely up about 3 times day and keeps the air at the setting of 50% humidity. I do not use the auto drain functionality, but instead manually empty the water container. It is very easy to use and automatically stops running when the water is full. It is louder than I expected, so I turn it off each night to sleep
customer_reviews.author: SBritt

customer_reviews.title: Good Engineering and durable
customer_reviews.text: I've purchase 3 of these. 1 for each floor of my 2 story home. 1 in the basement that runs just about full time in a space that really is just above the manufacturers recommendation. If it fails tomorrow I feel I got my moneys worth. Had some storm water damage down there when the rainfall exceeded my sub pump capacity in the fall. Dry as a bone now. Besides its durability and ease of use, the features I like best is the simple design of the device to divert the water to hose and drain instead of the bucket and the ease of cleaning the air filter without having to move or open the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Vinkavich

customer_reviews.title: Water capacity and noise.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy unpacking; convenient emptying of water; works as advertised with some cautions. Cons: 30 pints capacity? .More like 6+ pints to full shutoff. Not a problem for me but don't expect 30 pints. Maybe Ivation is advertising 30 pints per 24 hours continuous extraction if attached to the optional exterior drain? Lastly, quite noisy at night in bedroom, which can get used to after a few nights. The turbo button? Super noisy!!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Tom

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! We've had it running constantly and it seems ...
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this 4 stars because we've only been using it for a couple of months. So far so good! We've had it running constantly and it seems to be doing everything its supposed to do very well.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but it's loud.
customer_reviews.text: I'm in Florida and it gets very humid sometimes so this dehumidifier helps keep our lounge comfy. It's pretty loud though and the bucket was hard to get in and out but is getting easier the more it is emptied. It does a good job of removing excess moisture from the room. I'm guessing the room is 12' x 16'.
customer_reviews.author: GrannyK

customer_reviews.title: Not actually programmable but still good
customer_reviews.text: Good little unit with a big tank, but it's programmable humidistat is worthless. When it shuts itself off, it starts reading the humidity as high and kicks right back on after 1 or 2 minutes. Also the tank is tricky to get back in after you drain it.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We have spray foam insulation so keeping moisture out is necessary. This sucks most of the moisture out of the room/s. It's pretty heavy to pick up but it has rollers to help it move. If you need a noise maker to sleep this works great because it's very loud. It does what it's supposed to do...no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Teller

customer_reviews.title: No issues-love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! Too well! I never knew there was so much moisture in my house! Not too loud. Will purchase again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fugate

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: This machine takes all of the humidity out of the air. It works very quickly and shuts itself off when it’s full. It has made an incredible difference in our basement.
customer_reviews.author: K. Salko

customer_reviews.title: Helps out a lot.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Humidity is a constant struggle in South Louisiana. This takes care of that. So far to full tanks out of the air in 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Small space only
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold much water. I would like it to run continuously with a hose but it doesn't work very well so I have to empty it often, very inconvenient. It does a good job, but convenience level not the greatest
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen13

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my trailer in winter to prevent musty smells in winter due to moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Haller

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Appliance arrived in new condition, setup was easy, started easily. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: acamus

customer_reviews.title: Hose drain unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating! Does not like to empty thru rear tube- messed with multiple times,works ok- then soon switches to drawer. Don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: Roberto BlackCrowe

customer_reviews.title: Great portable unit
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in our video production trailer. I had problems with moisture that caused rusting in some of our expensive equipment. This has worked well in preserving the gear!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip G. Wong

customer_reviews.title: keeps humidity down for entire crawl space (1600 sq. ft home)
customer_reviews.text: keeps humidity down for entire crawl space (1600 sq. ft home)
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Grant

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This dehumidifier is just what I've been wanting. I wished the instructions manual was a bit more thorough, but some things I've figured out to do on my own. I'm getting what I wanted for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using the dehumidifier for one week and it is working well and as expected. Does not seem loud to me at all. It sounds like it’s working and more like white noise than a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in small cabin northern Michigan
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe the amount of water we took out of our cabin---ran well made a big difference. Very easy to use. After a couple of months still loving this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Alan

customer_reviews.title: Really works but loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take out extra humidity on my second floor in my home. It works however it is loud. Even on the lower setting. I have it near the bedrooms and it sounds like a loud noise machine. Luckily I only need this during summer months in NJ.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia barone

customer_reviews.title: Makes a hug difference
customer_reviews.text: I have to empty this 1x a day. It's a little noisy but purchased this for basement. (1000 square feet)
customer_reviews.author: Jeni O

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My mother had a bad moisture problem that allowed mold to grow in her home. It's a 2 bedroom 1 bath home good size. This unit has eliminated almost all moisture and no more mold. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Work well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Makes a fan noise (like any other fan) but doesn't take long to get use to.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisB

customer_reviews.title: Truly amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my basement and it is awesome. We hooked it up to drain into our sump pump crock.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Easy to assemble with hide attachment. Seems to be working fine. Has only been installed for 3 days
customer_reviews.author: KC Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good buy,  good results
customer_reviews.text: Does the job intended! Like the fact it had wheels. Efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but produces a lot of heat
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but produces a lot if heat!!! Kind of a bummer with the AC on. I gave it 4 stars for that reason. Otherwise wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Md

customer_reviews.title: Good little dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Nice little dehumidifier, not too noisy (sound comparable to running a box fan).
customer_reviews.author: Jill M.

customer_reviews.title: We did some research and found the Ivation would work best for our situation
customer_reviews.text: We live in Florida and during the spring and summer we get a lot of humidity in our home. We did some research and found the Ivation would work best for our situation. Best purchase we could have made! We not only have less moisture in the air but we can keep the thermostat higher and feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Schnepf

customer_reviews.title: Humidity Out
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps w FL humidity. It was 30 times larger than my original Ivation , and I wish I’d bought two or chosen larger. If fills up every 5-6 hours in So FL temps. A tad noisy, but it doesn’t keep anyone awake at night.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Rantz

customer_reviews.title: drier air
customer_reviews.text: There really isn't specific directions on how to use it. I think I have the settings right. Takes the moisture out of the air really well. Quiet.
customer_reviews.author: shadow

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the unit for my crawl space that was full of moisture and was ruining the insulation. It only took two days to dry everything out.
customer_reviews.author: JLZ

customer_reviews.title: works fine after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Good strong air circulation. A little less noise than others. Works fine after 8 months of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Ivaation 30 pint energy star humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Love the Unit. Quiet and efficient. Easy to run and makes a difference for sure! I highly recommend this product for anyone with a moisture concern
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap!!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 3 months, now I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Bookaa t

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for one week in humid MN. Runs loud, but works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bobnick

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and how quiet it is. Using in a triblevel home that gets moisture in some of the rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Strong and silent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 1200 sq ft condo. Gets a workout in the beach air and chugs along. Fairly quiet too
customer_reviews.author: John Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the downstairs comfortable
customer_reviews.text: That you can hook up hose to drain directly in a floor drain
customer_reviews.author: V. Huizenga

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, Just super Small
customer_reviews.text: This works amazing. I have it in my basement. However the water collection bin is ridiculously small. I have to empty it multiple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Water container is a little hard to get out sometimes though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachele J DeLorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Reservoir a bit small and needs frequent emptying.
customer_reviews.author: Wiilow

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Been running non stop for a week. Its pulling around 2 gallons, every 24 hours, at temps between 30F and 65F.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed how well the Ivation 30 maintains the desired humidity ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed how well the Ivation 30 maintains the desired humidity in my 1800 sq. ft space and how quiet it runs!
customer_reviews.author: marla ahlgrimm

customer_reviews.title: It's very quiet
customer_reviews.text: It runs very quiet. It does a great job, very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It has helped my allergies of mold tremendously.

customer_reviews.title: drain hose feature
customer_reviews.text: compact size plus the drain hose feature was a must
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Review on 30 pint model
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very Quiet, low price, removes moisture well Cons: Very small bucket, terrible instructions
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Value lacking
customer_reviews.text: Adequate. Poor design on water bucket (difficult to use, to small). I'd give it 3 stars if it sold for $50
customer_reviews.author: Otto Berlin

customer_reviews.title: Functionally
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to setup and with the comfort auto setting it is start and forget.
customer_reviews.author: bond

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Auto defrost stopped working, rendering the unit useless when most needed. Also, doesn’t drain with hose.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and easy controls
customer_reviews.text: Very well made dehumidifier and amazing job with hose attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Linda MccLurg

customer_reviews.title: Very good for our one level open style home
customer_reviews.text: East to roll around where its needed, motor only as loud as vent fan on low
customer_reviews.author: Milton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Running it about 10-14 hours a day. Really nice. I could have purchased a larger one but this will run all night before emptying.
customer_reviews.author: Jan R

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works really well but we have to empty the reservoir almost every day

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance, very small water tank, but good connection to a drain.
customer_reviews.author: EG1234

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't drain in the hose properly. After 2 days you have to empty the reservoir.MRH
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be perfectly pulling the excess moisture from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be perfectly pulling the excess moisture from the house - too early to tell if it will help with damp smell - I hope so!
customer_reviews.author: Southern bell

customer_reviews.title: Just a huge inconvenience from the false advertising- having to dump the bucket so often is not fun. But it works and runs quiet
customer_reviews.text: The water reservoir is NOT 8 gallons as indicated by the box (see attached picture). It should probably be .8 gallons! (Missing a critical decimal point). My husband and I do not have a means to hook up a house for continuous drainage, so the fact that this was advertised as having an 8 gallon reservoir was a major selling point for us. Aside from having to dump the bucket every 90 minutes, it does work well. Just a huge inconvenience from the false advertising- having to dump the bucket so often is not fun. But it works and runs quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Legrand

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for a review, have only had it ...
customer_reviews.text: Not ready for a review, have only had it 5-6 days but seems to be working. The controls are on the top and black, as in the same color as the top so if is extremely difficult to read. You need a flashlight when dealing with the controls.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Johnsan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a little hard to figure out but it's okay
customer_reviews.author: belapradd

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best humidifier I have ever owned. First the box had straps that you cut and then just lifted the box off then there it was...no struggling to pull it out of the box. It set up in a minute. It is idiot proof...just plug it in. Very easy to empty from the front or use the drain feature on the back. 800 sq ft cellar room feels dry as a bone in two days!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Naughton

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: We are currently living in a trailer while we rebuild our house. The humidity in here was increasing by the day, towels would not dry, the windows were dripping wet every morning. We ran this dehumidifier overnite and the results were amazing! We are so impressed and grateful to have found it. It actually shut off in the wee hours of the morning on that first night because it was full. Since then we run it every night for a while and life is good:)) It is pretty quiet and very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: leslie gossage

customer_reviews.title: this is a great unit! I would not want to continually have ...
customer_reviews.text: With the external gravity drain, this is a great unit! I would not want to continually have to empty the internal container.
customer_reviews.author: greg13782

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: I use this dehumidifier in our travel trailer. It removes moisture from the air quickly and it’s easy to use. You can drive yourself crazy researching dehumidifiers but after all is said and done, electric motors generate noise. What matters is moisture extraction. We run it while we’re away so it’s off while we’re eating or watching TV. There was so much moisture in our rig; the walls INSIDE our cabinets were sweating with water. Now everything is dry. I recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: JOAT

customer_reviews.title: Empty drawer is cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: The capacity for the cost is weak. The one i am replacing was $50, lasted 20 years and only needed to be emptied every 2 days this one was 169 and needs to be emptied 2 times a day. The tank drawer is cumbersome to remove without spilling the contents and cumbersome to re-seat in the machine. Ended up putting it on a table rather then its intended placement on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: France Murray

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, efficient and working well, BUT
customer_reviews.text: It is absurd that you do not include the 2 screws needed to install the hose connector to use a hose for continuous flow of water! For such an expensive, well made and efficient unit, to have to search around for 2 screws to complete the installation is ridiculous. They should have been included in the package with the rest of the parts. I would have given this unit a 5 star rating if they had only included the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kopper

customer_reviews.title: Just set it and forget it.
customer_reviews.text: The unit is small and convenient to move from room to room. It was hard to program so I just let it be whine I turn it on. The noise level when set to turbo at night is loud but on regular setting is just fine. Its winter so I can't open my Windows, and I keep having mildew issues especially in the bathroom. Haven't had much of a problem since purchasing the unit even though I don't run it often. So far so good. We'll see how it goes in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really happy
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this for our travel trailer. We had a moisture issue. Since we’ve had this no more issues. This product works great. We were at 50 sometimes 60% humidity. But now we are down to 30%. The product is reasonably quiet as well. It’s a hum kinda sound not to loud which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEHUMIDIFIER
customer_reviews.text: Had for a month or two, and runs very efficiently. Have a drainage hose attached, and only turns on when needed. My basement seems much drier.
customer_reviews.author: JByrd

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! Very quiet! Love that the hose hook up for continuous draining totally bypassed the bucket. My old one did not and when I removed it the bucket was full of water and about 2 inches thick of sludge in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Really really helping to dry out our ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Really really helping to dry out our 30x30 room. We run it throughout the week and turn it off while the room is in use.. Since we are using the hose attachment, we are having no problems.
customer_reviews.author: pwall

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This broke soon after we bought it and I have no clue how to get a return. I’ve contacted amazon right when it happened and now al Pay a year later I’m still lost

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for use in my basement. Even though my basement is about 1000 square feet I needed a dehumidifier that could handle a larger area because of the staircase that obstructs some of the air flow. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette R. Amatuccio

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my dehumidifier in July of this year,and really works well .Customer service is very helpful and promt. It does reduce the humidity as was stated and would recommend it to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a workhorse , my basement is dried out and stays dry now . Was worried about electric use , very minimal increase. Great investment !

customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, easy to unbox ant set-up. This unit is very quiet and efficient. It rolls easily and is simple to empty when the resovoir is full.

customer_reviews.text: Had a basement that was hot, humid, and musty. Within one day it was cool and humidity was low. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: This dehumidifier was very easy to set up and get the humidity out of the basement. Exactly what I needed after all the rain over the past few months.

customer_reviews.text: Works as well as described I do like this dehumidifier and I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Marie C. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Quite noisy but I guess that's a typical dehumidifier for ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite noisy but I guess that's a typical dehumidifier for you. It's a little on the small side, and it doesn't take long before the compartment is full of water. It's a little difficult to get the water compartment back in place after draining it, so you have to work it in carefully.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this thing sucks - the moisture out of the air (lol) really thought - it works great

customer_reviews.title: No User Guide
customer_reviews.text: No user guide included even though box says it was. It came set up to put water out the back of the unit rather than in water collection basket. With no user guide I did not know this and water ran out on floor.
customer_reviews.author: Tulsa

customer_reviews.title: Just what is needed for a  moist basement.
customer_reviews.text: Works as designed. Has the ability to connect to drainage, though I found the instructions for making it work less than transparent.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hartly Holte

product_meta.title: Ivation 30 Pint Energy Star Dehumidifier - For Spaces Up To 2,000 Sq Ft - Includes Programmable Humidistat, Hose Connector, Auto Shutoff / Restart, Casters & Washable Air Filter (30 Pint),White
feature_bullets: This Compressor Dehumidifier Keeps Your Space Cool & Comfortable by Removing 30 Pints of Moisture/Day
Built-In Humidity Sensor - The LCD accurately displays the current humidity level in the room, enabling you to set your ideal levels for automatic moisture control
Low Maintenance & Easy Operation; Simply Plug-In, Select Settings & Empty 1.3 Gallon Reservoir
Bright LED Display Indicates Humidistat & Setting, Fan Speed, Timer, Filter Alert & More
Highlights Include Eco-Efficiency (ENERGY STAR Certified), Casters, Auto-Defrost, & Auto-Restart

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars413 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Air Filter Included, Hose Hookup Connector Included, Long 6-foot power cord Included, Built-In RHT Meter Included, 4 Easy-Roll Casters Included
